data.title: Rahul Mahajan breaks silence on his separation rumours with Natalya Ilina
data.meta_description: Rahul Mahajan has reacted to his separation rumours with Natalya Ilina. Here's what he told an entertainment daily.
data.text:
Rahul Mahajan's married life with Natalya Ilina seems to have hit rock bottom. Before marrying Natalya in 2018, the former 'Bigg Boss' contestant was married to Shweta Singh and Dimpy Ganguly. After getting divorced twice, he found love in Natalya. However, according to the latest media report, Mahajan and Ilina have apparently headed for divorce.

Rahul addressed his separation rumours with Natalya in an interview. However, he neither accepted nor denied being separated from Ilina.

advertisement

RAHUL MAHAJAN ON SEPARATION FROM NATALYA ILINA

A source told Bombay Times that Rahul Mahajan and Natalya Ilina filed for divorce in 2022. "Compatibility issues were there between the two since the beginning. However, they stretched their marriage as long as they could. They parted ways last year and have filed for divorce," the source revealed.

READ | Only thing I've is honesty: Rahul Mahajan

But when Rahul was asked to comment on the same, he told the entertainment daily, "I want to keep my private life private. I would not like to comment on anything. I do not discuss what's happening in my personal life even with my friends... By the way, I'm doing well."

WAS RAHUL SHATTERED AFTER SEPARATION?

A close friend of Rahul informed the daily that the reality show contestant was shattered after his separation from Natalya.

"He was absolutely shattered after the breakup. Now he is doing fine. He is getting back to life. He was not in a great state the last year. Now, he is hoping to find love. He has also decided to not talk about his personal life due to his past experiences," said Rahul's friend.

Rahul was a part of 'Smart Jodi' with Natalya.
